Plates.description: Pa de coca del forn artesanal de la cantonada amb tomàquets de l'empordà
Plates.name: Pa de coca amb tomàquet

Plates.description: Foie artesanal del foie de la cantonada
Plates.name: Foie Gras d’ànec micuit a l ‘Armagnac

Plates.description: Plat per disfrutar del sabor de la carn de Girona combinat amb el dolç gust de l'arrós
Plates.name: Hamburgueses amb arrós caldós

Plates.description: Plat per disfrutar del sabor del mar
Plates.name: Dàtils de calamar

Plates.description: Pollastre recent extret del matadero del poligon de Mataró
Plates.name: Pollastre al forn amb prunes

Plates.description: Plat que manté l'essència de la cuina catalana
Plates.ingredients: Mongetes, panceta, tomàquet, all i juliverd
Plates.name: Mongetes amb panceta

Plates.description: Per gaudir d'un bon porc amb una guarnició que et deixarà fent la digestió 10h
Plates.name: Galtes de porc al forn

Plates.description: Per mantenir la temperatura corporal a l'hivern
Plates.name: Sopa de xoriço

Plates.description: Un bon postre per acabar el dinar amb un bon sabor de boca
Plates.name: Pastís de formatge

Plates.description: Sembla un plat salat però no ho és
Plates.ingredients: braç de gitano, sucre, més sucre
Plates.name: Braç de gitano

Plates.description: As we received a selection of appetizers my eyes found it hard to focus on what was edible or not. Finally they spotted the two almost transparent yellow discs joined by a black paste. The waiter specified mango discs with olive paste
Plates.name: Mango discs

Plates.description: One of the most incredible plates you will ever try
Plates.ingredients: Carrot, chips, lemon, ginger and liquorice
Plates.name: Intertwined carrot chips with lemon verbena, ginger and liquorice

Plates.description: Another joke. The savory caviar is turned into a sweet and juice imitation with a melon and passion fruit flavor. To fool the brain even more it is packaged into an El Bulli copy of Iranian caviar tin.
Plates.name: Melon caviar

Plates.description: Best plate if you are a truly fan of almonds and truffles
Plates.name: Crunchy almonds tender truffles

Plates.description: Navajas was a type of mussel served with a vegetable I have never seen in my life – kikurague, reminding of an asparagus by shape but extremely tender in texture served with a creamy souse. Excellent!
Plates.name: Mussels with "kikurague"

Plates.description: This beautiful pink coral is dark chocolate coated by sour raspberry powder. After savoring it I dug into the brown piece what seemed like it could be some sort of strange bread, possibly sweet. I expected the taste to be in any shape and size - it looked beautiful so I tried it. It was a rock. So Adrià has fooled us once again. Thank you, for this great and memorably evening!
Plates.name: Morphings

Restaurants.description: L’excel.lència en un platet, els sentits en una copa de vi, la sorpresa en un delicat postre, el plaer de ser mimat, el teu temps, el teu record, a partir d’avui, el teu restaurant.
Restaurants.name: Dos Cuiners

Restaurants.description: El Bulli is undoubtedly the most controversial and experimental restaurant in the world that receives up to 1,000,000 reservation requests a year, where only 8,000 lucky ones get a table.
Restaurants.name: El Bulli
